scripts.start:services: cd services/ && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.development.yml up -d --build
scripts.start:services:local: cd services/ && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.development.local.yml up -d --build && npm run start:local
scripts.start:interfaces: npx npm-run-all --print-label --parallel start:pa start:aw start:ho start:ref
scripts.start:121:local: LOCAL_DEVELOPMENT=1 cd services/121-service/ && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:pa-accounts:local: LOCAL_DEVELOPMENT=1 cd services/PA-accounts-service/ && npm run start:dev
scripts.install:interfaces: npx npm-run-all --print-label install:pa install:aw install:ho install:ref
scripts.open:all: npx npm-run-all open:121-service open:pa-accounts open:aw open:pa open:ho open:ref
scripts.test:interfaces: npx npm-run-all --print-label --parallel test:pa test:aw test:ho test:ref
scripts.install: echo 'Nothing to install here. See README.md#getting-started \n\n' && exit 1
